articles.title: Patriots running back James White announces retirement from NFL - Milwaukee Journal Sentinel
articles.description: James White rushed for more than 4,000 yards at UW but was known as much for his selfless attitude and desire to do anything to help his team succeed.
articles.content:
James White wasn’t the most touted running back recruit to sign with Wisconsin.
He led UW in rushing just one time in his four seasons, as a freshman in 2010.
